name: Mastery Talisman: United as One
description:
When an opposing character is defeated: Deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters.
End Phase: Deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When an opposing character is defeated:</color> Deal 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When an opposing character is defeated:</color> Deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters.
